questions.question: Why is it good to recycle your bags?
options: It allows you to have more space
Companies are trying to save money
To create a healthier planet for ourselves and future generations

questions.question: What can be done to reduce food waste at home?
options: Store leftovers and plan meals in advance
Leave perishable items out of the fridge

questions.question: Which of the following items should NOT be recycled?
What is composting?
options: A process to burn waste material
A method of recycling organic waste into nutrient-rich soil
A technique to break down plastic waste

questions.question: Which of the following items is a benefit of reducing plastic use?
options: Plastic waste decomposes faster in landfills
It decreases pollution in oceans and waterways
Plastic is cheaper than other materials
